info.name: Pardus style remake 2.0
info.description:
This is almost a complete remake 2.0 of css for the game Pardus with more of everything with a cherry on top.

* Make sure you use "Stylus" or you can try it as userscript . Both ways will protect your privacy *
* make sure you install http://gramajda.hekko24.pl/p/pardus/teutonnormalce.ttf font *
Some of the features:
- colors with --var_iables so you can fiddle with them to your liking (initial introduction)
- nav grid and highlight of mouse-hovered fields
- Some of links positioned fixed for convenient access
- Makes Bulletin boards look compact in a way (to disable, you have to delete everything from bulletin boards comment to tables comment)
- better space usage in some places

This probably works faster as userstyle used via Stylus rather than a userScript
info.additionalInfo:
This is almost a complete remake 2.0 of css for the game Pardus with more of everything.
Some of the features:

* make sure you install http://gramajda.hekko24.pl/p/pardus/teutonnormalce.ttf font
- nav grid and highlight of mouse-hovered fields
- Some of links positioned fixed for convenient access
- Makes Bulletin boards look compact in a way (to disable, you have to delete everything from bulletin boards comment to tables comment)
- better space usage in some places

This probably works faster as userstyle used via Stylus browser extension over a userScript. 

It does not matter if you are using normal imagepack at the same time and so the style will work the same if you have an imagepack enabled or disabled in your pardus account settings. 

It might work additionally with Pardus Quick Commands, Pardus Coords Addon and some other userscripts/extensions

Don't forget about configuration at the top of the code after you install. 
-ship in dock image (you should change it after installation)
-disable/enable button for exchanging Maneuver for ASP
-using a different font, which you have to install first on your system: http://psgrafika.republika.pl/pardus/teutonnormalce.ttf

If you have got any questions, suggestions or whatelse, please ask here* or on some other friendly place. These will help out others with similiar problems as yours. 

* It is naturally possible to start a discusion on this userstyle, but you need to register. 
If you have issues it is always helpfull to make a screenshot(possibly full page, not just screen) and copy the html source code to paste it on this: http://pastebin.com/ amazing page. Copy the url and include it in your issue along with the screenshot. 
Note, that every browser is different and even different versions of FF can interpret the style differently, but that might be fixed as well.
